<<<<<<< HEAD
The prince vvritten in French by Mounsier Du Balzac ; now translated into English. Balzac, Jean-Louis Guez, seigneur de, 1597-1654. H. G.
[80], 326 [i.e. 322], [2] p.
Printed for M. Meighen and G. Bedell, and are to be sold at their shop ..., London : 1648.
Translator's dedication signed: H.G. Two letters to Cardinal Richlieu, dated March 3, 1631, and Aug. 4, 1630 : p. [6-61] at beginning. Numbers 159-162 omitted in paging. Errata: p [1] at end. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
